execution_plan.description: Retrieve all products with their id, name and price from the main store database, and tag rows as 'product'.
execution_plan.query: SELECT id AS source_id, name AS title, price::numeric AS price, 'product' AS source, created_at AS created_at FROM products;

execution_plan.description: Retrieve all items with their code, title and price (converted from cents) from the alternate store database, and tag rows as 'item'.
execution_plan.query: SELECT code AS source_id, title AS title, (amount_in_cents::numeric / 100.0) AS price, 'item' AS source, created_on AS created_at FROM items;
